faqs.question: Do I get a certificate after completing a course?
faqs.answer: Yes, all certificate and degree programs include a digital certificate upon completion.

faqs.question: Are the courses self-paced?
faqs.answer: Yes, most courses can be completed at your own pace. Live events are optional.

faqs.question: How can I join a live session?
faqs.answer: Registered students will receive a link to join live sessions via email.

faqs.question: Can I access the content after the course ends?
faqs.answer: Yes, all content remains available to you for future reference.

faqs.question: What payment methods are accepted?
faqs.answer: We accept Visa, MasterCard, PayPal, and bank transfers.

faqs.question: Is there support available during the course?
faqs.answer: Yes, instructors and support staff are available via email and the discussion forum.

faqs.question: Can I request a refund?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a 14-day money-back guarantee for all purchases.
